summary: This bill, the 'Drain the Intelligence Community Swamp Act of 2025,' proposes to immediately and permanently revoke the security clearances of 51 named former intelligence community members. The targeted individuals are the signatories of the October 2020 'Public Statement on the Hunter Biden Emails.' The bill also mandates an investigation by the Secretary of Defense and the Attorney General into these individuals' roles in the 'Hunter Biden laptop scandal' and their engagement with the Biden Presidential campaign. No new or renewed security clearances could be granted to these individuals.
